title: Lam Research expects upbeat quarterly revenue on demand for chipmaking tools
description: Lam Research forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as chipmakers ordered more of its equipment used to manufacture semiconductors for artificial intelligence applications.
content: Shares of the Fremont, California-based company rose 2.2% in trading after the bell. The stock has doubled so far this year, supported by strong demand for AI semiconductors as chip designers seek equipment to create processors capable of meeting gro... [1032 chars]

title: The downside of banning AI in mental health therapy
description: Governments and professional standards bodies must determine how to establish appropriate safeguards for artificial intelligence in mental health therapy. .
content: The stories about bad advice from artificial intelligence keep on coming. One eating disorder treatment chatbot gave weight loss tips. Another AI offered teenagers advice on self-harm. A third, during testing, told a person with a substance use disor... [4511 chars]

title: Eric Trump posts AI video of crowd in White House holding up his book to promote his memoir
description: The video appeared to use artificial intelligence powered by Grok to depict a crowd in a room where Eric Trump hosted a book tour event this week
content:
Eric Trump, the second son of President Donald Trump, posted an artificial intelligence-generated video depicting a crowd of supporters holding up his new memoir and cheering in a trance-like manner to promote his new book, “Under Siege.”
Taking a pa... [2534 chars]

title: Meta cutting 600 AI jobs even as it continues to hire more for its superintelligence lab
description: Meta Platforms is cutting roughly 600 artificial intelligence jobs even as it continues to hire more workers for its superintelligence lab, the company confirmed on Wednesday.
content:
The Associated Press
MENLO PARK, Calif. (AP) — Meta Platforms is cutting roughly 600 artificial intelligence jobs even as it continues to hire more workers for its superintelligence lab, the company confirmed on Wednesday.

title: OpenAI, Oracle and Vantage to build Stargate data center site in Wisconsin

content:

title: OpenAI launches browser battle with Google
description: OpenAI introduced its own web browser, Atlas,  putting the ChatGPT maker in direct competition with Google as more internet users rely on artificial intelligence to answer their questions.
content:

title: Brains for bytes: Meta cuts 600 AI roles
description: Meta, the American tech giant that owns Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp, is planning to cut around 600 positions in its artificial intelligence (AI) division…
content:
Meta, the American tech giant that owns Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp, is planning to cut around 600 positions in its artificial intelligence (AI) division, according to a company memo cited by US media outlets.

title: IBM Q3 2025 earnings report
description: IBM's results topped estimates and the company lifted its guidance, citing artificial intelligence tailwinds.
content:
IBM reported third-quarter results that topped Wall Street estimates and lifted its guidance, citing ongoing artificial intelligence tailwinds. Still, the stock dropped 5% in extended trading.
